content.rendered:
Directed by Sajid. Farhad Samji.

Written by Farhad Samji. Sajid. Rajan Agarwal. Farhad Samji. Sajid. Jitendra Parmar.

Cast Akshay Kumar(Sandy AKA Sundi). Abhishek Bachchan(Bunty). Riteish Deshmukh(Teddy). Jackie Shroff(Urja Nagre). Jacqueline Fernandez(Ganga). Nargis Fakhri(Saraswati). Lisa Haydon(Jamuna). Boman Irani(Batuk Patel). Sameer Kochhar(Rishi (as Samir Kochhar)). Nikitin Dheer(Rohan). Aarav Choudhary(Rajeev (as Arav Chowdharry)). Chunky Pandey(Akhri Pasta). Adesuwa Oni(Margarett (as Adele Oni)). Rebecca Mayer(Mariya). Emilyne Mondo(Mona). Sagar Arya(Maliya). Anwesha Arya(Wife). Sher Khan(Hul). Honey Jalaf(Harry (as Huni Jalaf)). Theo Hayden(Harsh). Paul Lavers(Priest). Daniel Eghan(Man on Beach / Posh Party Guest). Sofia Abbasi(Business woman). Lee Adach(Seafront crowd). Farah Ahmed(Posh Party Guest). Manoj Anand(Posh Party Guest / Gurdwara Volunteer). Anisha Arora(Gurdwara Attendee). Deepshikha Arora(Posh Party Guest). Hitanshu Arora(Posh Party Guest). Robert-Anthony Artlett(Police Fight Spectator). Claire Ashton(Holidaymaker). Elli Avrram((as Elli Avram)). Raj Awasti(Posh Party Guest).

Language Hindi.

Producers Pearl Gill. Amit Gupta. Sunil Lulla. Rakesh Madhotra. Chris Martin. Sajid Nadiadwala. Sudipto Sarkar. Sushanto Sarkar. M.R. Shahjahan.

Production Eros Worldwide. Flame Visuals.
